title: Gravity Intro (Beginner)
intro: In this lesson, we will learn about the basics of gravity. Imagine gravity as a force that pulls objects towards each other.
outro: Congratulations! You have completed the beginner level of understanding gravity.

concepts.name: Gravity Basics
concepts.explain: Gravity is like a magnet that pulls things down. It is what keeps us on the ground and makes objects fall when we drop them.
concepts.example: Think of a ball rolling down a hill. Gravity is what makes the ball roll down instead of up.
